channel.title: My dodian NPC's allways hit 0's... ALLWAYS!
channel.description: I need to change it, I tried importing the whole NPC.java from Czars source and still no luck... I need help really badly please, my NPC's just keep hitting 0s even if ur 1 def...

item.title: My dodian NPC's allways hit 0's... ALLWAYS!
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(97);

npcType == 2745)

Above is 2745 the id of the npc you want to hit higher.

hitDiff = 2 + misc.random(97);

hitdiff is his absolute lowest possible hit no matter what.
misc.random(97);

97 is the best hit he can possibly get when you add 97 + 2. Add 97 + 2 = 99 right? Well so since his lowest hit is 2 and highest is 99 he will hit a constant amount of about 50s. To fix that change his lowest hit to 45 or 50 and his highest hit into 40 or 50. Then he will successfully hit around 70s and 80s.

Thins is all found in npchandler.java by searching :

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType ==

Read full topic
item.source: My dodian NPC's allways hit 0's... ALLWAYS!

item.title: My dodian NPC's allways hit 0's... ALLWAYS!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In Npchander.java, add this under monster attack animations:

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(highesthit);

Replace the npcid and highesthit.

Example:

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(97);

Which means, Tztok-Jad has the power to do a Max hit of 97, and a lowest hit of 0.

Read full topic
